entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:17 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 08:31 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -17.4°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
